params.wat: initialization data to be passed to the Safe wallet

drop(bytes).notice: Allows the caller to deploy a new Safe wallet and receive a payment in return.         If the authorizer is set, the caller must be authorized to execute the deployment.

rule(address).notice: Allows the chief to set an authorizer contract. Can only be called once. TODO: double check.
